overview:
As the ultimate Vegas Insider, Marko Greisen has 20 years experience in the Las Vegas hospitality industry with a direct focus on customer development and VIP guest relations. Having spent 16 of those years with the 9 Group, Marko worked side-by-side with founders Michael Morton and Scott DeGraff in developing the company portfolio to become one of Las Vegas’ leading restaurant and nightlife organizations, which included the rise in such venues as N9NE Steakhouse, ghostbar, Rain Nightclub and Playboy Club.

He played a crucial part in the success of the venues garnering a reputation for the ultimate VIP nightlife experience in Las Vegas which also included being known as the consummate host for a plethora of celebrities including Nicholas Cage, Jamie Foxx, Charles Barkley and many more. Marko also worked directly with Palms Casino Resort owner George Maloof to spearhead resort wide campaigns and further the success and brand awareness of the 9 Group to ensure the optimal experience for guests when visiting the restaurants and nightlife venues.

Marko is a native Las Vegan and has been recognized for his accomplishments and for his dedication and commitment to the community and its leading industry. In addition to being named one of the Vegas Top 100 by Las Vegas Life Magazine, July 29 is known in Las Vegas as “Marko Greisen Day,” an honor bestowed on him by the Mayor of Las Vegas. Marko also holds a Key to the City, awarded to him by the Mayor and Las Vegas City Council for his excellence and good standing within the community.
